sourcesContent:
const size = {
  mobileS: '320px',
  mobileM: '375px',
  mobileL: '425px',
  tablet: '768px',
  laptop: '1024px',
  laptopL: '1440px',
  desktop: '2560px',
}

export const device = Object.fromEntries(
  Object.entries(size).map(([key, value]) => [key, `(min-width: ${value})`])
) as Record<keyof typeof size, string>

export const pxToRem = (pixels: number) => `${pixels / 15}rem`

export const productivityBenefits = (
  years: number = 1,
  employees = 1000
): number => 309.5 * years * employees

export const itStaffProductivityBenefits = (
  years: number = 1,
  employees = 1000
): number => 76.1 * employees * years

export const riskMitigation = (years: number = 1, employees = 1000): number =>
  55.1 * employees * years

export const annualBenefits = (years: number = 1, employees = 1000) =>
  [productivityBenefits, itStaffProductivityBenefits, riskMitigation]
    .map(f => f(years, employees))
    .reduce((acc, n) => acc + n, 0)
